name: PlugBot Adventures
description:
You’re a PlugBot, your purpose: uncertain.

All you know is you're low on power, trudging through the wastelands in hopes of finding another rechargeable battery-powered plug adapter like yourself. You come across a large, techie-looking building and head inside, hopeful that you will find charging outlets, or even batteries. You find quite a few, but there’s a problem: they don't energize you enough... You check your levels, realizing you are not going to make it to wherever it was you were going.

This is your last chance. You commit yourself to searching the building in hopes of finding something long-lasting. On your journey you come across puzzles, other robots ready to battle you for the same thing, and a dawning realization of the stupidity of a society that built completely random tech in a completely random building in the middle of nowhere.

This game was submitted for the Lost Relic Game Jam 2022.

Controls

Move - WASD
Jump - Space
E - Interact
LMB - Melee
Q - Equip GunPlug
RMB - Shoot GunPlug

Team

Hulkmeistercoder#0598 - Gameplay Programmer
John - 3D Art @meleejohn4
Lee - Composer & Sound Designer @doctorlee.audio
Paul - Art & Animation, stublag.com
